text: Hidden Treasures is an extended play by American thrash metal band Megadeth. It was released on July 18th, 1995 by Capitol Records. The album has songs that were only on movie soundtracks and non-Megadeth albums. Four of the songs were released as singles, and three of them were nominated for Grammy Awards. == Track listing == The following track list can be verified with the Hidden Treasures liner notes.Hidden Treasures liner notes (Media notes). Capitol Records. 1995. p. 2. == References == Category:Megadeth
title: Hidden Treasures (EP)
